page.title: 06ALUMINIUM
page.content: TODAY MR S.FENWICK CAME TO MOORSIDE FIRST SCHOOL.HE WAS TALKING ABOUT {ALUMINIUM}BECAUSE HE WORKS AT ALCAN.MR FENWICK SHOWED US SOME PHOTOS AND BROUGHT SOME ALUMINA IN A PLASTIC BAG. ALUMIA IS WHITE IT FEELS LIKE SOFT SAND,IT WILL NOT HARM YOU IT IS NOT POISONOUS.THEN CHERYL AND RACHEL WENT TO THE COOKERY ROOM TO HAVE A QUITE TALK WITH MR FENWICK.WE HAD 20 QUESTIONS TO ASK HIM.HERE ARE SOME OF THE BEST QUESTIONS. 1.HAVE YOU GOT A LIGHT ON YOUR{HELMET? NO. 2.WHY IS IT DIRTY IN ALCAN?BECAUSE OF THE DUST FROM THE ALUMINA. 3.IS{ALCAN}BIG?YES IT IS VERY BIG OCCUPYUD SEVERAL{ACRES OF LAND. 4.DO YOU GO IN THE SHOWERS BEFORE YOU COME HOME?YES. 5.ARE THE DINNERS NICE AT ALCAN?YES. 6.DO YOU LIKE WORKING AT ALCAN?YES.
